adrFormatAddress: 3915 Broadway, New York, NY 10032-1565, USA

originalText.text:
This was my second time placing an order for delivery from this restaurant. The 1st time I order the food it was great, everything was cooked and flavorful. However, on my second attempt to order from them after having such a pleasant experience, is where everything went downhill. Not only did they sell me chicken empanadas that had rubbered cooked chicken from last year's Thanksgiving, but their chicken breast was undercooked and swimming in water. It spilled all over the other food that I ordered. I tried calling the restaurant to rectify what occurred & this is verbatim btw,  I was told “we have different cooks for the weekend and nights than we do during the week” “call Uber & have them deal with it” The fact that a restaurants excuse for selling someone undercooked and stale meat is that they have different cook is outrageous to me.

In my eye, it shouldn’t matter if you have different chefs. No restaurant should ever sell a customer stale plastic-looking or undercooked meat. It was also their professionalism & response to selling undercooked and stale meat that had me appalled by the entire situation. Thank Goodness for me, I always check my food before I eat so, I will not get sick. I highly recommend people not to eat from here to save themselves money and a trip to the ER. Either that or this restaurant needs to be placed under new management and find consistent chefs to cook the food. I however will not be eating from here again. Do yourself a favor & do the same.

originalText.text:
Horrible quality and care for the final product. Ingredients and items received by the Mr.Beast trademark company for the menu items were not used. Add on Items missing
in order such as caramelizad onions and seasoning, for the unseasoned Beast style fries, but also missing from the burger. Not the only time I hadn't received add ons
but on this occasion the quality lacked severely. The cheese as seen is not melted and there was hardly ketchup or mayonnaise added, and no seasoning, only a green sauce which tasted of honey mustard. Must have
been old due to the coloration. The burger bun was not toasted and wet for some reason, the cheese on the burger was not melted either and the patty itself was cold. I immediately began to eat after I had waited and picked
up my order. This tells me the patty has been sitting out for a while as I saw the woman assembly the burger. No caramelized onions, unseasoned, no mayo, no brown mustard and no pickles. Truly awful experience.

originalText.text: Good place to visit with friends and have a quick bite and drink. Last few times I've been here the food is good and tasty. Are group always have a good time here listening to music and watching sports while having a drink. If you in the area pass by for a bite. Good Spanish food.

originalText.text:
I don’t know where to begin.
The bad manner service.
The prejudice.
The poor communication language barrier.
The attitude, from the waiter.
The only good thing I had to said about this place is during a cold weather heat is good.
Sadly this Restaurant / Bar doesn’t deserve to be doing business with the public at all.

originalText.text: Went here for lunch....Food was Awful...Rice was mushy and pernil was bland. Complete waste of 12 dollars.
